name: Gaye Advert
description: English punk rock musician. Played bass guitar in The Adverts in the late 1970s. One of the 1st female rock stars of the punk rock movement.

name: Poly Styrene
description: English musician, singer-songwriter, and frontwoman for the punk rock band X-Ray Spex.

name: Pauline Murray
description: Best known as the lead singer of the punk rock band Penetration, originally formed in 1976.

name: Soo Catwoman
description: Soo Catwoman, was associated with the London punk subculture that sprang up around the mid-1970s. In 'The Filth and the Fury', Johnny Rotten singles her out among the early London punks, citing her 'skill, style, and bravery'.

name: Vivienne Westwood
description: English fashion designer and businesswoman, largely responsible for bringing modern punk and new wavefashions into the mainstream.

name: Palmolive
description: Palmolive, is a Spanish-born drummer and songwriter who was a member of influential early punk bands. She founded the Slits toward the end of 1976. After leaving that group in 1978, she joined the Raincoats and performed on their first album

name: Ari Up
description: Ari Up was a German vocalist best known as a member of the English post-punk band The Slits.

name: Viv Albertine
description: Australian-born British musician, singer, songwriter and writer. She is best known as the guitarist for the punk band the Slits. Prior to joining the Slits, Albertine was a member of the Flowers of Romance

name: Siouxsie Sioux
description: English singer, songwriter, musician, and record producer. She is best known as the lead singer of the rock band Siouxsie and the Banshees.AllMusic named Siouxsie as 'one of the most influential British singers of the rock era'

name: Lorna Doom
description: Lorna Doom, was an American musician best known as the bass guitarist for the punk rock band the Germs from 1976 to 1980, and again after they got back together from 2005 to 2009.

name: Alice Bag
description: American punk rock singer, musician, author, educator and feminist arctivist. She is the lead singer and co-founder of the Bags, one of the first wave of punk bands to form in the mid-1970s in Los Angeles.

name: Joan Jett
description: American rock singer, songwriter, composer, musician, record producer, and actress. Jett is best known for her work as the frontwoman of her band Joan Jett & the Blackhearts, and for earlier founding and performing with the Runaways

name: Debbie Harry
description: American singer, songwriter and actress, known as the lead vocalist of the band Blondie. Her recordings with the band reached No. 1 in the US and UK charts on many occasions from 1979 to 2017.

name: Penelope Houston
description: American singer-songwriter best known as the singer for the San Francisco-based punk rock band the Avengers.

name: Kira Roessler
description: American musician, singer, and two-time Emmy Award-winning dialogue editor. She is perhaps best known as the bassist for the influential hardcore punk band Black Flag during the 1980s.

description: English punk rock musician. Played bass guitar in The Adverts in the late 1970s. One of the 1st female rock stars of the punk rock movement.
